#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
int main(){
    int val,s,temp,i,j,t,x,y,z,n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        scanf("%d %d %d %d",&n,&x,&y,&z);
        for(i=9;i!=0;i--){
            s=0;
            for(j=9;j>=0;j--){
                temp = j + z*10 + y*100 + x*1000 + i*10000;
                if( (float(temp)/n) == int(temp/n) ){
                    printf("%d %d %d\n",i,j,temp/n);
                    s=1;
                    break;
                }
            }
            if(s==1)
                break;
        }
        if(i==0)
            printf("0\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
